node.title: Episode 9: Hazen Foss & William Foy- Unfaithful and Faithful
node.description: Two men, named William Foy and Hazen Foss received the prophetic gift during the 1840s, though each would have vastly different experiences in their life and ministry. One was faithful and shared what he has seen and was one unfaithful to the call with very sobering consequences.
